A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the worst movies I've ever seen. Pointless dialogue\, zero storyline\, bad directing and full of cringe. It made me question if this was even a serious film. Mindless\, heartless\, a mockery of Star Wars. If The Force Awakens wasn't enough of a sign\, this one certainly is. It's like Star Wars got cancer.\n\nI'm actually going to rewatch the prequels to remind myself of a better follow up to the originals.
